excerpt: Vulcan Energy Resources Ltd (ASX:VUL) has broken ground on the first phase of its major geothermal and lithium extraction plant (G-LEP) in the Upper Rhine Valley in Germany.

labels.summary: Vulcan Energy Resources has commenced construction on the first phase of its geothermal and lithium extraction plant in Germany's Upper Rhine Valley. This represents a significant milestone in the company's integrated approach to lithium production and renewable energy generation.
